tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive drug information from pharmaceutical databases including generic/brand names, classifications, mechanisms of action, and basic safety profiles.

drug_identifier.description: Drug name, brand name, or NDC code to query

include_generics.description: Whether to include generic equivalents in results

error_messages: Drug not found: The provided drug identifier does not match any entries in the database. Verify spelling and try alternative names or NDC codes.
Invalid identifier format: Provide a valid drug name or NDC code format.
Database connection error: Unable to access drug database. Retry or use offline reference.
usage: Provide a drug_identifier (name or NDC code) to retrieve complete drug information. Set include_generics to false if only brand-specific information is needed.
